name: onda-mobile
description: Onda mobile app built with Capacitor

scripts.mobile:dev: npm run build:web && npx cap sync android && npx cap run android
scripts.mobile:build: npm run build:web && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && echo 'APK file: mobile/android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk'
scripts.mobile:usb: npm run build:web && npx cap sync android && npx cap run android --target
